name: pokemon-react-app
description: Pokemon app built with React, Redux, Typescript and TailwindCSS.

scripts.start: echo '🚀 Starting the app...' && webpack serve --config webpack.config.cjs && echo '🌟✨ App is up and running! Visit http://localhost:3002 ✨'
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building the app...' && webpack --config webpack.config.cjs && echo '🏗️✨ Build completed! Your app is ready! ✨'
scripts.format: echo '🖋️ Formatting code...' && prettier --write . && echo '✨🎨 Formatting completed! Your code is now beautifully formatted! ✨'
scripts.lint: echo '🧹 Linting code...' && eslint . && echo '✅ Linting completed!'
scripts.lint:fix: echo '🛠 Fixing lint issues...' && eslint . --fix && echo '✅ Linting fixes applied!'
scripts.precommit: echo '🔒 Precommit: Linting and testing code...' && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.debug: echo '🐞 Starting the app in debug mode...' && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect src/index.tsx
scripts.clean: echo '🧽 Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist ./coverage && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force

author: Jagoda11
